name: Toy's Adventure
description:
The game starts with Billy trapped in the city where he has to find his basketball, to achieve this the player needs to dodge vehicles and dogs. Once the first level is passed, the player takes on the role of a toy rocket and has to avoid the train at all costs to survive, when the train passes, the player has to land on a red area to go to the next level. Once reaching the third level the player adopts the figure of a toy racing car, in this level the player must meet Billy and must go through an obstacle course with a lot of difficulty, if the player has a lot of skill and crosses the track, he meets Billy and the game will end.

GDD Toy's Adventure Evidencia visita juegos del JAM
